price: Dhe mos iu qasni kurvërisë, se ajo është shfrenim dhe rrugë e shëmtuar!
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
